transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ji ji, Adhik Industries mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay sir, main Pallavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, senior manager. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya madam ekdam mast, bataiye aap.
Executive: Haan ji. So I think sir aapko kuch tender ki information chahiye thi, toh I think Madhavi ne aapko guide kiya hai na sir tenders vagera kaha se lena hai and kaise apply karna hai?
Customer: Ji, unhone GEM ID, GEM ID ke bare mein bataya tha unhone, par woh kuch technical issue ke karan woh GEM ID create nahi ho paayi hai.
Customer: Toh unhone bola ki abhi apan usme many time try kar chuke hain, toh block aur na ho jaye, koi aur issue na ho jaye, toh isliye apan try nahi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Theek hai sir. Toh usme aap apni ID bana lijiyega GEM portal pe. Baaki kaun kaun se tenders market mein aa rahe hain, us- uska aap details hamare buylead mein jaake tenders mein dekh sakte hain, latest tenders mein. Yeh idea hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi, yeh abhi kuch bhi, maine kal, kal mein IndiaMART ka application check kar raha tha, toh usme tenders ka option dekha maine. Aur aaj suddenly ek lead bhi aayi hui thi, toh maine woh dekha toh maine mam se confirm kiya.
Customer: Ab usme actually maang kya raha hai woh, jaise usme likha rehta hai nursery pouch, nursery bag.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Tenders mein, matlab product mein likha hua rehta hai ki nursery bag maang rahe hain, toh nursery bag kis type ki bag maang rahe hain, kya size rahega, toh yeh details vagera kaha se milegi puri?
Executive: Sir sir sir, ek toh yeh bataiye, nahi nahi mera sawal yeh hai ki aapko IndiaMART ka application se use karte hain ya system se use karte hain?
Customer: Dono se use karta hu main, dono use karta hu.
Executive: Dono se use karte hain. Toh jab aap usme latest buylead jab dekhte hain, toh usme ek latest tender aata hai, latest tender ka option dekha hai aapne?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Latest tender mein jab aap uspe click karte hain, view tender information, toh usme aapko uska pura detail aur PDF files vagera mil jaati hain. Correct?
Customer: Jaise main view tender detail pe click kar raha tha main, toh usme documentation aur kis department ka tender hai aur kya cheez hai bas itna yeh sab details di hui thi. Matlab product ke bare mein details sirf, product ke bare mein sirf itna likha hua tha ki nursery bag. Ab nursery bag mein kya hai?
Executive: Nahi sir, nahi aap usme jaiega, jab aap usme dekhenge consumed tenders mein aap jaake dekhenge na, usme pura files PDF, do teen PDF attached rehte hain, puri detailing di hoti hai. Toh maine proper nahi dekha, proper nahi dekha hoga sir maine aisa ho sakta hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: System se dekhenge toh sir dekhiye mobile mein thoda sa chota version hota hai, toh mobile mein thik se dikhta nahi hai. Right? Agar aap isko system pe dekhenge, view tender information karke, usme bahut sari files aayengi PDF.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Usme proper aapko details mil jayegi. Toh IndiaMART ka aapko matlab hai idea ki tenders kaise uthana hai aur kya kya usme documents chahiye hota hai, usko apply GEM portal pe karna hai ID create karke. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap toh wohi matlab maine abhi first time hi dekha hua tha maine kal, toh maine aaj uske bare mein thodi si inquiry li. Ab usme kya kya documents ki requirement rahegi woh sab mere ko ek baar usme se dekhna padega aur thoda bahut puchna padega.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji ji sir. Toh isme kuch aur bhi aapko information chahiye toh aap bataiye.
Customer: Na na yeh GEM ID ek baar ban jaye toh uske bare mein main usko, ab jaisa aapne bataya ki usme PDF attached rehti hai toh jo ki maine dekh nahi paayi hain. Unko aur thoda sa dekhta hu proper, agar mere ko kuch understanding nahi hoti hai ya kuch samajh nahi pata hu toh main phir aapse puch lunga ek baar.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Toh isme aap, aapke paas kya Madhavi ka number hai ya kya kehte hain, Madhavi number, Madhavi number.
Customer: Ji ji Madhavi number, Madhavi number.
Executive: Madhavi mam ka number bhi hai mere paas, Sameer sir ka number bhi hai mere paas, Rohit sir ka number bhi hai.
Customer: Ab Rohit sir ka number, Rohit.
Executive: Nahi nahi Rahil, Rahil sir ka nahi hai, unka number nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Achha achha koi baat nahi. Aapke paas Madhavi ka number hai na sir? Toh Madhavi aapko ek baar Rahil ka number bhi share kar degi jisse aapko aise tenders ke bare mein dobara agar aapko information chahiye hogi toh aap Madhavi ko contact kar lijiyega ya phir aap Rahil ko contact kar lijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji mam ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Toh abhi jo aapki request aayi hai information ke liye, aapko puri information de di hai Madhavi ne, toh request close kar de?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye. Matlab mere ko aur kuch abhi, abhi actually pura fulfill close toh nahi hua hai, but abhi request open hai toh usse koi matlab nahi hai kyunki mere ko dobara query karna hi padega. Toh main mam ko kal call karunga phir.
Executive: Haan haan, directly aap directly Madhavi ko hi call kar lijiyega sir. Aur main Rahil ka bhi number aapko WhatsApp kar deti hu. In case Madhavi ka number nahi lagta toh Rahil aapke do account manager hai, kisi ko bhi call kar sakte hain. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay mam, okay mam.
Executive: Chaliye sir, okay sir, theek hai, thank you.
Customer: Welcome mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Could not create GEM ID due to technical issues.

- Needs details on nursery bag tenders.

- Wants to know the documents required for tenders.



Resolution:

- Advised to create ID on GEM portal.

- Can find tender details in buyleads.

- Advised to check consumed tenders for PDF files.

- Advised to use system for clear visibility.

- Executive offered to share Rahil's contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share Rahil's number on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, gem id, buyleads, documents, nursery bag
